tagline: Untangling the Web of AI Research
description: Welcome to AI Démêlé Studio, where Fagun transforms the intricate web of AI research into clear, accessible insights. Like a skilled weaver untangling complex threads, we take the most challenging AI papers and craft them into stories everyone can understand.

author.name: Fagun Raithatha
author.bio: The AI Weaver - transforming complex research threads into clear, accessible insights that anyone can understand and enjoy

site.title: AI Démêlé Studio
site.subtitle: Untangling the Web of AI Research
